name: Ultra HD Mega Anime Pong (Juice Edition)
name_original: Ultra HD Mega Anime Pong (Juice Edition)
description:
Ultra HD Mega Anime Pong is a juicy version of the classic game PONG for 2 players. Play as Goku or Saitama to determine who is the strongest in the universe and enjoy the particle madness as the opponents level up and earth gets demolished. Endless fun for 2, or ... 1...I guess...

A game for the Juice Jam 2022. My first game and my first entry in a game jam, have fun!
